document.full_text: fishermen spotted a large great white shark on friday off martha's vineyard in massachusetts, officials said, signaling the seasonal return of the powerful creature known to feast on the area's gray seals.
document.title: summer shark season comes early to martha's vineyard
lines_and_colors: fishermen spotted a large great white shark on friday off martha's vineyard in massachusetts, officials said, signaling the seasonal return of the powerful creature known to feast on the area's gray seals.
